column4: If i install a deb for a program and then later decide i dont want that app so I go into synaptic package manager and remove the package.How do i get rid of all the programs dependencies that were installed, if I know there not needed by anything else? Do you have to go and uninstall them all by hand or is there a faster way?
it didnt remove anything from the looks of it.
maybe the packages are now used by other software you also installed? alternatively deborphan might help
